includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: Take aim with a slick superhero drama from the makers of Smallville and Game of Thrones. Playboy Oliver Queen sets out to right wrongs and save his city.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Take aim with a slick superhero drama from the makers of Smallville. Playboy Oliver Queen sets out to right wrongs and save his city.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Take aim with a slick superhero drama from the makers of Smallville and Game of Thrones. Playboy Oliver Queen sets out to right wrongs and save his city.

includedAssets.title: Honor Thy Father
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver targets a corrupt businessman with connections to the Chinese mafia, but the stakes are raised when Laurel's life is put in danger.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oliver targets a corrupt businessman with connections to the Chinese mafia, but the stakes are raised when Laurel's life is put in danger.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver targets a corrupt businessman with connections to the Chinese mafia, but the stakes are raised when Laurel's life is put in danger.

includedAssets.title: Lone Gunman
includedAssets.synopsis: Things get personal when Oliver finds himself on the trail of aptly-named assassin Deadshot. Laurel and Tommy are caught in a compromising position.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Things get personal when Oliver finds himself on the trail of aptly-named assassin Deadshot. Laurel and Tommy are caught in a compromising position.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Things get personal when Oliver finds himself on the trail of aptly-named assassin Deadshot. Laurel and Tommy are caught in a compromising position.

includedAssets.title: An Innocent Man
includedAssets.synopsis: The vigilante needs Laurel's help to prove the innocence of a man framed for murder. Meanwhile, Walter grows suspicious of Moira's behaviour.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The vigilante needs Laurel's help to prove the innocence of a man framed for murder. Meanwhile, Walter grows suspicious of Moira's behaviour.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The vigilante needs Laurel's help to prove the innocence of a man framed for murder. Meanwhile, Walter grows suspicious of Moira's behaviour.

includedAssets.title: Damaged
includedAssets.synopsis: Laurel has a difficult decision to make after her father arrests Oliver for murder. An iconic DC Comics character makes his series debut too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Laurel has a difficult decision to make after her father arrests Oliver for murder. An iconic DC Comics character makes his series debut too.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Laurel has a difficult decision to make after her father arrests Oliver for murder. An iconic DC Comics character makes his series debut too.

includedAssets.title: Legacies
includedAssets.synopsis: A band of bank robbers dubbed The Royal Flush Gang threaten Starling City. Diggle pushes Oliver to help those who really need a hero.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A band of bank robbers dubbed The Royal Flush Gang threaten Starling City. Diggle pushes Oliver to help those who really need a hero.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A band of bank robbers dubbed The Royal Flush Gang threaten Starling City. Diggle pushes Oliver to help those who really need a hero.

includedAssets.title: Muse Of Fire
includedAssets.synopsis: Things hot up as fanboy fave The Huntress stops in Starling City. Oliver has a connection with Helena, the mysterious daughter of a mob boss.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Things hot up as fanboy fave The Huntress stops in Starling City. Oliver has a connection with Helena, the mysterious daughter of a mob boss.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Things hot up as fanboy fave The Huntress stops in Starling City. Oliver has a connection with Helena, the mysterious daughter of a mob boss.

includedAssets.title: Vendetta
includedAssets.synopsis: Two vigilantes are better than one when Arrow joins forces with The Huntress. Diggle, however, has serious reservations about their relationship.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Two vigilantes are better than one when Arrow joins forces with The Huntress. Diggle, however, has serious reservations about their relationship.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Two vigilantes are better than one when Arrow joins forces with The Huntress. Diggle, however, has serious reservations about their relationship.

includedAssets.title: Year's End
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver tries to inject festive cheer into the Queen household by throwing a party. However, Diggle dampens the mood with some sobering news.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oliver tries to inject festive cheer into the Queen household by throwing a party. However, Diggle dampens the mood with some sobering news.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver tries to inject festive cheer into the Queen household by throwing a party. However, Diggle dampens the mood with some sobering news.

includedAssets.title: Burned
includedAssets.synopsis: Confidence shaken, Oliver decides to hang up his hood and take a break from being Arrow. Until, that is, DC Comics villain Firefly makes an appearance.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Confidence shaken, Oliver decides to hang up his hood and take a break from being Arrow. Until, that is, the villain Firefly makes an appearance.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Confidence shaken, Oliver decides to hang up his hood and take a break from being Arrow. Until, that is, DC Comics villain Firefly makes an appearance.

includedAssets.title: Trust But Verify
includedAssets.synopsis: Things get personal when Arrow moves on to his next target: Diggle's former mentor in Afghanistan and a suspect in a spate of robberies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Things get personal when Arrow moves on to his next target: Diggle's former mentor in Afghanistan and a suspect in a spate of robberies.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Things get personal when Arrow moves on to his next target: Diggle's former mentor in Afghanistan and a suspect in a spate of robberies.

includedAssets.title: Vertigo
includedAssets.synopsis: When Thea is caught using drugs, Oliver contacts his former flame and current vice cop to find the dealer, a man who calls himself 'The Count'.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Thea is caught using drugs, Oliver contacts his former flame and current vice cop to find the dealer, a man who calls himself 'The Count'.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Thea is caught using drugs, Oliver contacts his former flame and current vice cop to find the dealer, a man who calls himself 'The Count'.

includedAssets.title: Betrayal
includedAssets.synopsis: Arrow faces his greatest threat so far in the form of Cyrus Vanch, a nefarious criminal looking to regain leadership of Starling City's underworld.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Arrow faces his greatest threat so far in the form of Cyrus Vanch, a nefarious criminal looking to regain leadership of Starling City's underworld.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Arrow faces his greatest threat so far in the form of Cyrus Vanch, a nefarious criminal looking to regain leadership of Starling City's underworld.

includedAssets.title: The Odyssey
includedAssets.synopsis: A wounded Oliver reaches out to someone surprising for help, before flashbacks return to a seminal event on the island involving Slade Wilson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A wounded Oliver reaches out to someone surprising for help, before flashbacks return to a seminal event on the island involving Slade Wilson.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A wounded Oliver reaches out to someone surprising for help, before flashbacks return to a seminal event on the island involving Slade Wilson.

includedAssets.title: Dodger
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver borrows Cupid's arrows and asks Detective McKenna Hall out on a date. A pair of nimble-fingered criminals also make their presence known.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oliver borrows Cupid's arrows and asks Detective McKenna Hall out on a date. A pair of nimble-fingered criminals also make their presence known.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver borrows Cupid's arrows and asks Detective McKenna Hall out on a date. A pair of nimble-fingered criminals also make their presence known.

includedAssets.title: Dead To Rights
includedAssets.synopsis: A shock is in store for our hero when Deadshot resurfaces. Alive and well, the troubled assassin has set his sights on Malcolm.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A shock is in store for our hero when Deadshot resurfaces. Alive and well, the troubled assassin has set his sights on Malcolm.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A shock is in store for our hero when Deadshot resurfaces. Alive and well, the troubled assassin has set his sights on Malcolm.

includedAssets.title: The Huntress Returns
includedAssets.synopsis: Trouble looms when the Huntress blazes back into town, while Laurel struggles to reconnect with her mum (guest star Alex Kingston).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Trouble looms when the Huntress blazes back into town, while Laurel struggles to reconnect with her mum (guest star Alex Kingston).
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Trouble looms when the Huntress blazes back into town, while Laurel struggles to reconnect with her mum (guest star Alex Kingston).

includedAssets.title: Salvation
includedAssets.synopsis: The latest target to be taken down is The Saviour, a crazed vigilante who cites Arrow as the inspiration behind his kidnapping and killing spree.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The latest target to be taken down is The Saviour, a crazed vigilante who cites Arrow as the inspiration behind his kidnapping and killing spree.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The latest target to be taken down is The Saviour, a crazed vigilante who cites Arrow as the inspiration behind his kidnapping and killing spree.

includedAssets.title: Unfinished Business
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver is reunited with The Count following a Vertigo-related death at the nightclub. Meanwhile, Tommy finds himself in a very tight spot.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oliver is reunited with The Count following a Vertigo-related death at the nightclub. Meanwhile, Tommy finds himself in a very tight spot.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver is reunited with The Count following a Vertigo-related death at the nightclub. Meanwhile, Tommy finds himself in a very tight spot.

includedAssets.title: Home Invasion
includedAssets.synopsis: Deadshot returns to Starling City and a vengeful Diggle isn't far behind. Meanwhile, Laurel takes drastic actions to protect a young witness.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Deadshot returns to Starling City and a vengeful Diggle isn't far behind. Meanwhile, Laurel takes drastic actions to protect a young witness.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Deadshot returns to Starling City and a vengeful Diggle isn't far behind. Meanwhile, Laurel takes drastic actions to protect a young witness.

includedAssets.title: The Undertaking
includedAssets.synopsis: When Felicity uncovers a lead on Walter, Oliver gambles on her in the field for the first time. Elsewhere, Tommy stuns Laurel with the truth.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Felicity uncovers a lead on Walter, Oliver gambles on her in the field for the first time. Elsewhere, Tommy stuns Laurel with the truth.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Felicity uncovers a lead on Walter, Oliver gambles on her in the field for the first time. Elsewhere, Tommy stuns Laurel with the truth.

includedAssets.title: Darkness On The Edge Of Town
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep22 - Darkness On The Edge Of Town
includedAssets.synopsis: Oliver prepares to take on the Dark Archer, while Laurel makes a decision following Tommy's revelation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Oliver prepares to take on the Dark Archer, while Laurel makes a decision following Tommy's revelation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Oliver prepares to take on the Dark Archer, while Laurel makes a decision following Tommy's revelation.

includedAssets.title: Sacrifice
includedAssets.synopsis: The stakes are raised in this first season finale. Oliver and Diggle race to stop the Dark Archer before he puts his devastating plan into action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The stakes are raised in this first season finale. Oliver and Diggle race to stop the Dark Archer before he puts his devastating plan into action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The stakes are raised in this first season finale. Oliver and Diggle race to stop the Dark Archer before he puts his devastating plan into action.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Armed with a bow and arrow, hooded vigilante and billionaire playboy Oliver Queen fights crime on the streets of Starling City. Hit DC comic book action series starring Stephen Amell.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Armed with a bow and arrow, hooded vigilante and billionaire playboy Oliver Queen fights crime in Starling City. Comic book action with Stephen Amell.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Armed with a bow and arrow, hooded vigilante and billionaire playboy Oliver Queen fights crime on the streets of Starling City. Hit DC comic book action series starring Stephen Amell.

includedIn.title: Arrow
includedIn.synopsis: After five years stranded on a desert island, billionaire playboy Oliver Queen returns to Starling City to battle evil as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow and arrow.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Armed with a bow and arrow, hooded vigilante and billionaire playboy Oliver Queen fights crime on the streets of Starling City.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After five years stranded on a desert island, billionaire playboy Oliver Queen returns to Starling City to battle evil as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow and arrow.
